changeSet.author: csteele
changeSet.comment: Fix system_role_module to use a sequence
changeSet.sql:
CREATE SEQUENCE clinlims.system_role_module_seq INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 1;
UPDATE clinlims.system_role_module SET id = NEXTVAL('system_role_module_seq');

changeSet.author: csteele

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM clinlims.system_role WHERE name = 'Identifying Information Edit';

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO clinlims.system_role_module(id, has_select, has_add, has_update, has_delete, system_role_id,system_module_id) VALUES (NEXTVAL('system_role_module_seq'),'Y','Y','Y','Y',(SELECT id FROM clinlims.system_role WHERE name = 'Identifying Information Edit'),(SELECT id FROM clinlims.system_module WHERE name = 'ElectronicOrderView'));
